pages.text: Used as the base for all Imbuing. Focus the power of a $(thing)Power Stone$() through various $(thing)Aspect Foci$() to Imbue items with effects
pages.title: Imbuing Chamber

pages.text: These constructed frames contain a lens that allow you to focus the energy of $(thing)Power Stones$() through them, imbuing certain traits into the stream.$(br)Stacking different combinations of foci results in different imbuing applications onto the target item in the chamber
pages.title: Aspect Foci
